JobFullDesc: The Specialized Technology Recruiting Team at Facebook supports specialized technical hiring across unique hardware initiatives and innovative technologies. These organizations are responsible for developing and building the software and hardware platforms that power Facebook, its Infrastructure, and its family of apps today (including Data Center, Core Systems Engineering, Foundation, Enterprise, Network Engineering, Production Engineering, Connectivity, Privacy and Security teams) and the Facebook Reality Labs platform (Augmented and Virtual Reality and Artificial Intelligence [AI]).As we hire some of the best technical minds around, we need the best recruiting minds to match our business needs. As a Recruiting Manager, you will apply your operational depth and strategic thinking to develop, drive, and execute on the staffing strategies within our Optics (AR/VR) pillar. You will lead a team of staffing professionals who execute against global hiring targets and work closely with multiple stakeholders to drive world class recruiting practices with a constant eye on scaling for the future.
